price: Nokorε nso sε na wͻne Nyankopͻn adikan ahyε bͻ sε wͻnnane wͻn akyi mma (agyidiefoͻ no da). Apam a εwͻ Nyankopͻn hͻ deε, nokorε sε εwͻ ho ano yie.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ كَانُواْ عَٰهَدُواْ ٱللَّهَ مِن قَبۡلُ لَا يُوَلُّونَ ٱلۡأَدۡبَٰرَۚ وَكَانَ عَهۡدُ ٱللَّهِ مَسۡـُٔولٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walaqad kānū ʿāhadū al-laha min qablu lā yuwallūna al-adbāra wakāna ʿahdu al-lahi masūlan
